rooms.description: A dedicated multimedia room with soundproofing, comfortable seating and large screen display; designed to be wheelchair accessible, following acoustic best practices and Vastu alignment for entertainment spaces.

rooms.description: Comfortable room for guests with accessible design features; includes sufficient headroom and maneuvering space as per ADA guidelines.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Bathroom designed with wider doors, grab bars and non-slip surfaces to ensure safety for wheelchair users. Integrated within guest room suite.
